title: The American Story is a Story of Grievance (with John Biguenet)
itunes:title: The American Story is a Story of Grievance (with John Biguenet)
description:
With all of the publishing scandals going on, I thought it made sense to re-up this conversation with novelist John Biguenet. Why is the standard narrative in American writing the narrative of victimhood? How do we move past seeing creativity as only a form of personal expression? 

http://patreon.com/publicintellectual

http://jessacrispin.com
